scripts.start-admin: node tools/copy.js src/apps/admin/App.js src/App.js && yarn start
scripts.start-emp: node tools/copy.js src/apps/emp/App.js src/App.js && yarn start
scripts.start-guest: node tools/copy.js src/apps/guest/App.js src/App.js && yarn start
scripts.build-guest: node tools/copy.js src/apps/guest/App.js src/App.js && yarn build
scripts.build-emp: node tools/copy.js src/apps/emp/App.js src/App.js && yarn build
scripts.build-admin: node tools/copy.js src/apps/admin/App.js src/App.js && yarn build
